Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "The LFC (log feed channel) exists to provide the developers with an extended tool for debugging runtime systems. The LFC uses the chatlib code with a series of debugging- and filtering-specific extensions.\\r\\n\\r\\nInformation on how to add the LFC to your application is available on TWiki:\\r\\n- http://troll.skotos.net/twiki/bin/view/Builders/"

"+lfc verbose\\r\\n Display extensive help text.\\r\\n\\r\\n+lfc service\\r\\n List your hooks- and ignores-list.\\r\\n\\r\\n+lfc \\"+NPC\\"\\r\\n Add the hook \\"NPC\\" to your hooks list if it does not exist already; any messages with the tag \\"NPC\\" will be displayed to you.\\r\\n If the hook NPC already exists in your hooks list, it will be removed.\\r\\n\\r\\n+lfc \\"+NPC=3\\"\\r\\n Add the hook \\"NPC\\" to your hooks list, and set it to only show you the more severe messages of priority 1-3 (panic, critical, severe).\\r\\n\\r\\n+lfc \\"-NPC\\"\\r\\n Add the hook \\"NPC\\" to your ignores list if it does not exist already; any messages with the tag \\"NPC\\" will be hidden from you.\\r\\n If the hook NPC already exists in your ignores list, it will be removed.\\r\\n\\r\\n+lfc \\"-NPC=3\\"\\r\\n Ignore all NPC messages with a priority less than 3 (severe).\\r\\n\\r\\n+lfc \\"+*\\"\\r\\n Clear (remove all entries from) your hooks list.\\r\\n\\r\\n+lfc \\"-*\\" \\r\\n Clear your ignores list.\\r\\n"
